Elisabeth Murdoch, daughter of 21st Century Fox and News Corp NWS -1.17% Executive Chairman Rupert Murdoch, has started a new media company focusing on short-form video for mobile devices, according to people familiar with the matter.
That filing also listed Vertical’s London address as the same as that of Freelands Ventures, Ms. Murdoch’s investing fund focusing on media, technology and entertainment.
The company, called Vertical Networks, was incorporated in September in the U.K., according to a filing listing Ms. Murdoch as the company director and sole shareholder.
